column4: i'm wondering why firefox treats mp3s differently depending on the page.
so is there a possibilty to set configurations?
or is it impossible to configure the firefox-configuration?
need help with firefox
can somebody help me with firefox?
is ther ea firefox-expert?
if you really need a firefox expert, mozilla has it's own irc-server.. I think it's irc.mozilla.org
magnetron, want to know how to configure firefox, because the browser handles playing mp3 differently depending on the page.
I don't play mp3's in firefox so I wouldn't know.. have any example urls?
magnetron handling mp3 as i expected (opening a player): http://africanbeat.de/catalog/index.php?cPath=64  ; handling playing mp3 differently: https://www.soundquake.com/?page=shop/browse.php
I'll take a look.. brb
the second one seems to open a new page with a player...
both sites work the same on my computer
I think I've installed the firefox vlc plugin thingy
how did you configure the browser?
vlc package?
I haven't done anything special that I can remember..
there is a firefox vlc plugin.. a separate package
installed mozilla-plugin-vlc but didn't change anything.
restarted firefox?
yes. did a restart.
hmm.. odd.. well. the firefox plugin system for playing videos and mp3 etc is weird.. perhaps someone else knows more.. ask the room again
